run.summary: Continued Incubator build: completed Phase 3 (Scoring) and Phase 4 (Patterns). 46 insights scored above threshold, 28 archived. Pattern-hunter found 4 semantic clusters with 28 cross-references. Created session context blob for continuation. All 42 tests passing across 4 phase test suites.

what-worked.item: Heuristic keyword-based scoring proved effective without LLM calls
Jaccard similarity for clustering produced meaningful semantic groups
Regression test strategy (each phase includes prior tests) caught issues early
Context blob format enables seamless session continuation
Top scorer "Simplicity catalyst" at 8.2 composite aligns with intuition

what-didnt.item: Initial index status tracking used folder names ("archive") vs schema ("archived")
Theme-based pattern filenames caused idempotency failures
Pattern-hunter needed explicit cleanup of old files before regeneration

files-modified.file: Updated with scoring status and archived insights
46 insights with R/C/N scores and composite

run.scoring-formula: composite = (relevance * 0.4) + (confidence * 10 * 0.4) + (novelty * 0.2) Threshold: >= 4.0 stays in scored, < 4.0 goes to archive

next-session.step: Phase 5: Build promotion logic (composite >= 7.0 AND confidence >= 0.7)
Create session-start hook to surface relevant insights
Implement decay mechanism for aging unreinforced insights
Build /incubator relevant command for context-aware queries
